name: Wukong: Elemental Fury
description:
A Hack and Slash, Action game revolving around Sun Wukong from Chinese Mythology. He must slay the demons on Earth on request by the Heavens themselves.

(Not finished yet)

by: Brian Benedetti (Lead Designer and Lead Programmer), Ryan Bergsteedt (3D Modeler and Lead Animator), Marco Prinsloo (Environment Artist), Levashan Pillay (UI Developer and QA) and Rugare Ponde (Lead Artist)
